Living Direct Inc.

Living Direct Inc.

Software development for eight different E-commerce businesses, under Living Direct, Inc, a subsidy of Build.com.

E-commerce
Demandware

Implemented a system for customers to bundle items together to create custom appliances.

Won the LAGNIAPPE Award, which is given for excellence, dedication, leadership and innovation at each semi-annual company meeting, within the first sixth months.

Wrote jobs to pull in in relevant articles on a product-level, category-level basis.

Created a means for customers to initiate returns online, significantly reducing the volume of calls to the call center.

Toggle-enabled info header that pulls in content dynamically from server-side.

Implemented a system end-to-end for customers to bundle items together, allowing them to order custom appliances. Raised conversion rate (CR) by 8% and average order value (AOV) by 27%.

Completely rewrote estimated delivery, beyond refactorization. Improved load time optimization by reducing estimated delivery calculations by 50%, even with the expansion of covering two more ship methods.

Completed and closed 285 JIRA (task tracker) tickets within 9 months.

Helped create new coding and code review standards.

Used-PCs.com

Used-PCs.com

Full-stack web development for the E-commerce platform as a member of a marketing company, ColoredLion.

Web Dev
SQL Scripting
PHP
BigCommerce
E-commerce

Automated several processes. Noteably overhauled the inventory system by writing scripts which reduced inventory update times from 13 manual hours to 15 minutes, even while expanding from one channel to four.

Added new features to the website such as a custom Product Detail Pages and global navigation bar.

Helped raise revenue by 33% within a year.

Designed and implemented a custom PDP. Shown: tech specs section and related products carousel.

Launched new website design within a month of being hired, raising revenue by 8% from the previous year for Black Friday / Cyber Monday.

WeatherVain

WeatherVain

Developer and designer for an iOS app prototype for a class that combined Computer Science and Journalism majors into teams.

iOS
Objective-C
OpenWeatherAPI
CocoaPods
Facebook Parse

"[Jaime] was the driving force behind the app. She has an incredible ability to develop a vision to solve really complex problems, and then to translate that vision into reality. She’s flat-out brilliant, and our team was lucky to have her."

Named the [unofficial] MVP of the event by judges.

"Best Overall App" and "Most Original Idea" at the second annual University of Texas at Austin - Apps Demo Day.

Wrote an algorithm that supplied more than 5200 outfit possiblities dependent on the weather and user preferences.

Hat Fancy

Hat Fancy

Team lead for a web application that acts as a gateway to a database that lists the price data of items that can be purchased and sold among Dota 2 players.

Web App
Bootstrap
University
Python
jQuery
AngularJS
API (Apiary)

Landing page with custom graphics.

Also setup the database, wrote tests and wrote 80% of the extensive technical report.

Created the relational model for the back-end.

Learned Twitter Bootstrap 3 and created a custom responsive front-end from scratch within 2 days. The only team to not use a premade theme.

Two of the custom dynamic templates - about page and heroes page.
